products.title: Harewood Plain White Vertical Blind
products.description: Our harewood plain is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With its seductive colour palette and attractive prices harewood is one of their bestselling plain ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. Don't miss out. Free delivery on all harewood plain white vertical blinds orders over 145 across the uk, only at kingston blinds direct.

products.title: Harewood Blackout White Vertical Blind
products.description: Our harewood blackout is a premium quality 100% polyester fabric. It can be manufactured as both vertical or roller blinds and is suitable for use throughout the home and conservatory. With the added benefit of its colour matched blackout backing and attractive prices harewood blackout is one of their bestselling blackout ranges. Buy it for your home today we're sure you'll love it. For excellent light control choose the harewood blackout white vertical blind from kingston blinds direct.
